name: unundir
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))

stmt.origin: eqtr3i(cun(cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)), cun(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c2)), cun(cun(c0, c1), c2))
-| wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c2)), cun(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c2)), cun(cun(c0, c1), c2))
-| wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c2)), cun(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c2)), cun(cun(c0, c1), c2))
-| wceq(cun(c2, c2), c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c2)), cun(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cun(c2, c2), c2)

|- wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c2)), cun(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))

body.origin: |- wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), cun(c2, c2)), cun(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wceq(cun(cun(c0, c1), c2), cun(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))

comment: Union distributes over itself. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2004.)
